item.title: Markets are finally believing Fed chair Jerome Powell will pull off his soft landing

item.title: Years of inflation have changed Americans’ spending habits. Here are their priorities as the Fed cuts rates

item.title: No case for more jumbo rate cuts by the Fed, strategists say
item.description: There is no case for more 50-basis-point rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, veteran market strategists told CNBC.

item.title: Sen. Elizabeth Warren and Rep. Madeleine Dean demand food and beverage CEOs put a stop to 'shrinkflation'
item.description: In letters sent to General Mills, Coca-Cola and PepsiCo, the lawmakers asked the corporations to end their “pattern of profiteering.”
